title: Materiales Vallejo
subtitle: Est. 1985 in Matamoros, Tamaulipas
details: We are a building material store from Matamoros, Tamaulipas aiding in the growth and development of our community. We are part of Construrama, the nation's largest network of material stores. We offer tailored services to fulfill the needs of any construction project or business.

We excel in selling Cemex Gray Cement and are one of the top distributors of cement in our community. We have access to distribution and manufacturing channels that enable us to satisfy our client needs.

Our purpose is to provide the best building material brands in the nation at the lowest prices. We serve the needs of a diverse marketâ€”from individuals working on home rennovation projects to government departments developing entire communities. We currently work with a close network of building and hardware stores throughout our community and take care of their building material needs. We offer flexible credit payments, manufacturing prices, and free shipping.
We'd love to hear about you and how we can satisfy the needs of your current business or upcoming project.
